item.title: Ilustracje
item.description: No one is interested in yet another blog about software engineering! The thing is, I don’t want to create yet another ‘blog’. There’s plenty of skillful, experienced developers sharing their perspective on technical subjects on a daily basis and that’s great! For me, this place is all about creativity. Inspired by all those crazy covers of The New Yorker I decided to create a space where I’ll be able to sharpen multiple skills at once, mixing writing with my own illustrations and drawings.
